abstract: Some of Chávez’s best-known works — including his “Sinfonía india” and “H.P.,” a ballet symphony — will be played, along with works by Silvestre Revueltas, Alberto Ginastera, Heitor Villa-Lobos, and an overview of Mexican choral music.

headline.main: Bard SummerScape to Feature Work of the Composer Carlos Chávez
headline.print_headline: Bard SummerScape To Focus on Chávez
